name: TEST REQUIRED - Shop drawings to be reviewed  and permission to proceed given.
INSPECTION BY - Named reviewer or contract administrator
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Start of task
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Shop drawings to be accepted by the reviewer. Building Information Model  (BIM) is being used for the construction works.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Ruakaka BESS-Concrete Pads Project Specification 6-P0304.03
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Mix Design used prior to use
TEST REQUIRED - Portland cement to NZS3121,
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Batch
TEST REQUIRED - Supplier Documentation, photos of spacings
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to pouring
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Reinforcement of precast retaining wall to be YD12-200 vertical and horizontal with D12-200 starters. Reinforcement of in-situ strip footing to be 2/YD12 with R6-300 stirrups
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to pouring
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Reinforcement to have maximum 75mm clearance and minimum 50mm clearance.
Cast in Items - Nuts, Bolts and Studs
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to Ordering
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - EA bolts to be M16 Hilti RE-500
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Batch
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Batch
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - 7 day after casting
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - 60 % of the specified strength
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing site concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Strip footing to be 400mm wide and 200mm deep
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing site concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Subgrade to meet 3 blows/ 100mm with scala testing
TEST REQUIRED - Quality shape and size of formwork
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - All formwork to meet  the specification  required for the unit being constructed
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Foundation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Site concrete to be placed at the thicknesses shown on the drawings and finished to a height of +/- 10mm
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each string
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Foundations and embedded items shall be set out following the tolerances, heights and positions shown in each foundations respective drawing.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing structural concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Pre pour inspection sheet to be completed prior to placing concrete. WCL to be notified of pours for inspection at least 24 hours prior to placing concrete.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Following placement of concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Post pour inspection sheet to be completed following each pour.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Completion of PCS slab
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Confirmation From Engineer on as built records & redline mark ups
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Products and materials selected for alternatives specified, Approved substitutions and accepted alternatives, Other approved changes and deviations to items specified.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Completion of PCS slab
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Confirmation From Engineer of all records
TEST REQUIRED - Submit a producer statement for  precast units
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Completion of PCS slab
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Producer statement to verify the products meet the requirements specified.
Completion Inspection inc.  Construction Defects Report
TEST REQUIRED - Completion inspection on  each foundation by CEL
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Completion of PCS slab
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Provided a completed construction defect report that that details any remedial measures taken, & snag lists closed out
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Completion of PCS slab
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Panels to be marked and identified as to which pour they're from and final location.
